solution_line_template: Since Mr. Banks had {mr_banks_investments_count} investment streams and each brought in a revenue of ${mr_banks_revenue_per_investment}, he earned {mr_banks_revenue_per_investment}*{mr_banks_investments_count} = $<<{mr_banks_revenue_per_investment}*{mr_banks_investments_count}={mr_banks_total_revenue}>>{mr_banks_total_revenue} from all of his investments.

Ms Elizabeth also received ${ms_elizabeth_revenue_per_investment}*{ms_elizabeth_investments_count} = $<<{ms_elizabeth_revenue_per_investment}*{ms_elizabeth_investments_count}={ms_elizabeth_total_revenue}>>{ms_elizabeth_total_revenue} in revenue from her {ms_elizabeth_investments_count} income streams,

The total amount of money that Ms. Elizabeth made more than Mr. Banks is ${ms_elizabeth_total_revenue}-${mr_banks_total_revenue} = $<<{ms_elizabeth_total_revenue}-{mr_banks_total_revenue}={difference_in_revenue}>>{difference_in_revenue}
